update gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_TXN_JNL
CHK_FLG ='1', CHK_TIM = #{chkTim,jdbcType=CHAR}, TXN_STS='S'
where GAME_ID = #{gameId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND DRAW_ID = #{drawId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND TXN_LOG in (select a.TXN_LOG from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_TXN_JNL a, gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_CHK_DTL b where a.GAME_ID=b.GAME_ID and a.DRAW_ID=b.DRAW_ID and a.KENO_ID=b.KENO_ID and a.SCH_ID=b.SCH_ID and a.LOT_NAM=b.LOT_NAM and a.TXN_LOG=b.TXN_LOG and a.PLAY_ID=b.PLAY_ID and a.TXN_AMT=b.TXN_AMT and a.TXN_STS in ('S', 'T'))

CRD_NO=#{crdNo} AND BET_TYP=#{betTyp} AND BET_DAT between #{begDat} and #{endDat} AND TXN_STS='S'

order by TXN_TIM desc
